member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.GPIO.PinMode(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.PinMode)
member.summary: Setup the mode of a pin to either Input, Output, Pwm output or Gpio clock Note that only wiringPi pin 1 (BCM_GPIO 18) supports PWM output and only wiringPi pin 7 (BCM_GPIO 4) supports CLOCK output modes
member.param: The mode to assign the pin

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.GPIO.PullUpDnControl(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.PullMode)
member.summary: Setup the pull-up or pull-down internal resistor mode on the given pin, which should be set as an input
member.param: The mode to assign the input pin

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.GPIO.DigitalReading(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout)
member.summary: Returns the value of the pin. Returns true for high
member.param: The pin to read the value of

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.GPIO.DigitalWrite(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the value high or low to the given pin. True value for high

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.GPIO.PwmWrite(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the value to the PWM register for the given pin. The Raspberry Pi has one on-board PWM pin, pin 1 (BMC_GPIO 18, Phys 12)
member.param: The pin to use for PWM

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.SoftPwm.SoftPwmCreate(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setup a pin for software pwm

member.name: M:WiringPiSharp.SoftPwm.SoftPwmWrite(WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.WPiPinout,System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the value of the pwm pin

member.name: T:WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.PinMode
member.summary: The mode to assign to pins

member.name: T:WiringPiSharp.WiringPi.PullMode
member.summary: Sets the pull-up or pull-down internal resistor mode on the given pin
